name: Woman's Prison
storyline:
"Baioret Women's Prison" was a prison for female criminals who had committed crimes, and I was the highest official here, the "warden".
I just could not believe it! My father actually sent me here? What the hell was going on here!!!
In my understanding, isn’t the prison all male? And even if it was a women's prison .....
Why was it me?
summary: One day you were dispatched to a women's prison to take charge of the lives of the female prisoners and explore the inner secrets of those girls. There are six girls to be explored.
